article: How to Become a Welcome Wagon User on wikiHow
intro: Are you familiar with the basic (or advanced) ins and outs of wikiHow, and interested in using the Welcome Wagon to welcome new contributors to the community? Users who are trusted to use the Welcome Wagon feature are called "Welcomers". Becoming a welcomer is easy - all you need to do is take and pass a simple test. This article explains the steps required to become one.

steps.title: Email your completed test.
steps.subtitle: Send it to . You should receive a reply in a week or so, letting you know if you passed the test.
sub-points: Be sure to include your wikiHow username in the email so that Jayne (a wikiHow staff member) knows who to add the Welcome Wagon rights to if you pass the test.
Don't lose heart if you don't pass on your first try. You can try again a month later, and in the meantime you can practice other skills!
If you pass, you can add yourself to this list of active Welcomers.
